text:
With #COVID19 #vaccine rollout underway, there has never been a more important time for researchers to engage the public.

Today we want to #ExploreVaccines with the British Society for Immunology @britsocimm.

Discover how you can help inform the public: https://t.co/KDfPZIPIAX https://t.co/eehgXRLFkC
